data.title: Basel Chamber Orchestra Foundation and Legacy
data.meta_description: The foundation supports projects of the orchestra so that it can reach a wide audience in Basel and worldwide with its music and activities.
data.text:
You can also support the Basel Chamber Orchestra with a legacy. A legacy is a gift in which a person, in their will, gives certain assets or property to another person or organisation. The bequest can take the form of money, real estate, works of art or other assets.

Bequests can be made to the charitable Basel Chamber Orchestra Foundation. The Basel Chamber Orchestra Foundation

supports projects that ensure the long-term artistic excellence of the Basel Chamber Orchestra.

Become part of an institution that is close to your heart and enter the history of the predominantly privately financed Kammerorchester Basel as a patron. Your passion for the Basel Chamber Orchestra lives on with a legacy.

The Basel Chamber Orchestra Foundation is recognised as a non-profit organisation and is therefore tax-exempt.
